lexUnit.name: wash.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: clean with water and, typically, soap or detergent.

sentence.text: Possibly he also washed his face , she did not know , never having asked him .
Wash your face at least half an hour before you go outdoors .
He had evidently finished feeding and was washing his face with his front paws .
She washed her face and went wearily back to look out for him , but she was losing hope .
It leaves hair in fabulous condition , with no perm odour and you can even wash your hair the same day , without affecting curl formation .
I wash my hair and leave it to dry naturally .
I want to wash your hair .
` I 'm washing my hair , " Jenny answered .
Dot did n't tell her that at school they already had hot and cold water and she could wash her hands and face at any time .
Iris washed her hands and filled the kettle .
Alice cooked herself eggs , drank tea , and washed herself in cold water , standing in the bath .
The probability is that the murderer washed himself in the kitchen . "
Ca n't you wash her in the shower instead ?
I ran up to the guest room , stripped naked and washed myself with a wet rag .
A delicate oriental nurse washed my feet with antiseptic and chatted while the locally injected anaesthetic took effect .
I must wash myself with warm water and soap ; find a sharp scissors and put it in boiling water for fifteen minutes ; get clean sheets to lie on ; sip liquids ; and relax .
When she was finished there she hurried back to the kitchen where she washed herself at the sink .
She was soon back with a trolley and all the necessary requisites , and between them they washed the woman from top to toe , and dressed her in a white hospital gown .
When he 's finished eating , he starts washing himself .
You used to go out in the in the wash-house and wash yourselves , under the cold water tap .
She washed herself and put on a bathrobe , then poured herself a glass of cold milk in the kitchen .
The bath in which Nilsen washed his victims is gone ; there is now only a shower-room .
Fortunately a lorry driver was washing in the basin , so while he went off to have a shit in one of the cabinets , I rifled his spongebag and pinched a disposable razor .
Some simply washed in the pool of water meant for each eagle , dipping their heads and wings in and letting the water run down their backs .
She was always washing .
This man allowed him to wash , and sleep for forty-eight hours , and gave him a cast-off , vintage suit , but then turned him out .
There must be enough time and space for each child to wash properly .
She washed quickly and brushed her teeth , then returned to Nathan 's cabin .
He washed thoroughly , standing under his shower while the hot water poured over him .
